info.title: Revenueable AI API Documentation
info.description: This is the documentation for the Revenueable AI APIs. The Revenueable AI API follows RESTful principles, making it intuitive and easy to integrate with your applications. All API requests should be made to the base URL. The API accepts and returns data in JSON format. Ensure your requests include the appropriate Content-Type header for POST and PATCH requests.

tags.name: calling
tags.description: Endpoints for making and managing calls.

tags.name: analytics
tags.description: Endpoints for accessing call analytics and performance metrics.

tags.name: termination
tags.description: Endpoints for terminating active calls using different methods.

get.description: Retrieves information about your current workspace.

200.description: Successful Response: Information about the current workspace.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users in your current workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of users in the workspace.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available phone numbers in your workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of available phone numbers.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

metadata.og:title: Get All User Workspaces | Revenueable AI

get.description: Retrieves a list of all workspaces accessible to the current user.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of user workspaces.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

patch.description: Regenerates a new API key for the current workspace.

parameters.name: X-API-KEY
parameters.description: (Required) Your current Revenueable AI API key.

200.description: Successful Response: New API key generated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available assistants in your workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of assistants.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available voices for assistants, optionally filtered by language.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Filter voices by language (e.g., 'en-US', 'hi-IN'). Multiple languages can be comma-separated.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of available voices.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

patch.description: Updates an existing assistant with new configuration settings. Each operation requires specific fields to be provided.

oneOf.example: You are a helpful sales assistant.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format.

detail.example: Selected voice does not support the specified language

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

metadata.og:title: Get Assistant By ID | Revenueable AI

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific assistant by its ID.

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: (Required) ID of the assistant to retrieve.

200.description: Successful Response: Detailed information about the assistant.

example.agent_prompt: You are a helpful sales assistant.
example.intro_message: Hello! I'm calling from Revenueable AI.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

delete.description: Deletes an assistant by archiving it (soft delete).

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: (Required) ID of the assistant to delete.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

post.description: Starts a new individual outbound call to a specified recipient. The from_number field is required and should be a valid phone number with country code.

name.description: The name of the person to call

mobile_number.description: The phone number to call (must include country code, e.g., +91 for India)

agent_id.description: UUID of the agent that will handle the call

from_number.description: The phone number to call from (with country code)

custom_args_values.description: Custom variables that will be replaced in the agent's prompt using @{{variable_name}} syntax

retry_not_picked.description: Minutes to wait if not picked (default: 30)

scheduled_at.description: Schedule the call for a specific date and time (ISO 8601 format). When provided, the call will be queued and executed at this exact time. The call_start_time and call_end_time window still applies as additional validation. Use this for precise scheduling of individual calls. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS

200.description: Successful Response: Details about the initiated call.

custom_args_values.description: Custom variables passed in the request

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves the history of calls made through the Revenueable AI platform with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter calls starting from this date (ISO 8601 format with timezone).

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter calls up to this date (ISO 8601 format with timezone).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of calls to return (default: 10).

parameters.name: bulk_list_id
parameters.description: Filter calls by bulk list ID.

200.description: Successful Response: Call history. Response format depends on download_format parameter.

calls.name: abhishek
calls.transcript: [{"bot": "Hi there! I'm Marcel from sdfasd. We're conducting a brief survey about asdfasdf to improve our services. Your feedback"}, {"bot": "is valuable to us."}]

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

post.description: Downloads call history data in CSV format. Supports bulk download of call records with optional filtering. Use 'include_analysis=true' to include call analysis data (platform_analysis and client_analysis) in the export.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter calls starting from this date (ISO 8601 format with timezone)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter calls up to this date (ISO 8601 format with timezone)

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Filter by agent ID(s) - can be repeated for multiple agents.

parameters.name: include_analysis
parameters.description: Include call analysis data (platform_analysis and client_analysis) in the export.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of call records to download.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of call records to skip for pagination.

message.description: Success message when email format is used
message.example: Call history export has been queued. You will receive an email shortly.

example.message: Call history export has been queued. You will receive an email shortly.

schema.description: ZIP file containing CSV call history data
ZIP file containing CSV call history data with headers like: id, to_number, name, status, transcript, recording_url, agent_id, initiation_time, etc.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific call using its unique identifier. Use the send_analysis parameter to include analysis data in the response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (Required) The unique identifier (UUID) of the call.

parameters.name: send_analysis
parameters.description: (Optional) Whether to include analysis data (platform_analysis and client_analysis) in the response.

id.description: The unique identifier of the call

call_status.description: The current status of the call

from_number.description: The phone number the call was made from

to_number.description: The phone number the call was made to

callee_name.description: The name of the person called

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent that handled the call

transcription_url.description: Array of conversation turns between bot and user

example.bot: Hello, how can I help you today?

example.user: I need information about my order

example.bot: I'd be happy to help you with that. Can you provide your order number?

platform_analysis.description: Platform-generated analysis of the call (only included when send_analysis=true)

client_analysis.description: Client-specific analysis of the call (only included when send_analysis=true)

transcription_url.bot: Hello, how can I help you today?

transcription_url.user: I need information about my order

transcription_url.bot: I'd be happy to help you with that. Can you provide your order number?
Hello, how can I help you today?

transcription_url.user: I need information about my order

transcription_url.bot: I'd be happy to help you with that. Can you provide your order number?

404.description: Not Found - The call does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

delete.description: Deletes a contact list and all associated contacts by list ID.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the contact list to delete.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

404.description: Not Found - Contact list not found.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of campaigns for the current user with optional call count information.

parameters.name: call_count
parameters.description: Whether to include call count for each campaign (default: true).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of campaigns to return (default: 10).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of campaigns to skip for pagination (default: 0).

campaign_start_time.description: Scheduled start time for the campaign

campaign_end_time.description: Scheduled end time for the campaign

total_count.description: Total number of calls in campaign (only included when call_count=true)

registered_count.description: Number of registered calls (only included when call_count=true)

completed_count.description: Number of completed calls (only included when call_count=true)

limit.description: Number of campaigns requested per page

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

post.description: Initiates a new campaign with the specified configuration.

agent_id.description: (Required) ID of the agent that will handle the calls.

list_id.description: (Required) ID of the uploaded campaign contact list.

from_numbers.description: (Required) Array of phone numbers to use for outbound calls.

has_ongoing_calls.description: Whether the workspace has other ongoing calls

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

metadata.og:title: Upload Campaign Contact List | Revenueable AI

post.description: Uploads a contact list for a campaign. Accepts a CSV file and campaign configuration as form data.

variables_map.description: (Required) JSON string mapping variable names to columns

campaign_start_time.description: (Required) Start time for the campaign (DD/MM/YYYY, HH:MM format)

campaign_end_time.description: (Required) End time for the campaign (DD/MM/YYYY, HH:MM format)

file.description: (Required) CSV file containing the contact list.

200.description: Contact list uploaded and campaign saved successfully.

list_id.description: ID of the created campaign list

custom_args_values.description: Array of custom variables for each contact

total_rows.description: Total number of rows in uploaded CSV

failed_rows.description: Number of rows that failed validation

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or file.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication.

500.description: Internal Server Error.

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive platform analytics including performance metrics and summaries.

parameters.name: start_date

parameters.name: end_date

parameters.name: bulk_list_id
parameters.description: Filter by specific bulk list/campaign ID

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache

parameters.description: Start date for analytics filter (YYYY-MM-DD format)

performance_metrics.description: Detailed performance metrics for the bulk list

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache

400.description: Bad Request - Missing required bulk_list_id parameter.

number_analytics.description: Analytics data grouped by phone numbers

patch.summary: Terminate All Calls by Agent ID

metadata.og:title: Terminate All Calls by Agent ID | Revenueable AI

patch.description: Terminates all active (registered/retry) calls associated with a specific agent across all campaigns.

agent_id.description: (Required) ID of the agent whose calls should be terminated

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid agent ID or no terminable calls found.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

patch.summary: Terminate Specific Calls by Call IDs

metadata.og:title: Terminate Specific Calls by Call IDs | Revenueable AI

patch.description: Terminates specific calls using their unique call IDs. Useful when you know exactly which calls to stop.

call_ids.description: (Required) Array of call IDs to terminate

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid call IDs or no terminable calls found.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

metadata.og:title: Terminate All Calls in Campaign | Revenueable AI

patch.description: Terminates all active (registered/retry) calls within a specific campaign.

campaign_id.description: (Required) ID of the campaign whose calls should be terminated

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid campaign ID or no terminable calls found.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

metadata.og:title: Terminate Specific Numbers in Campaign | Revenueable AI

patch.description: Terminates calls to specific mobile numbers within a campaign. Useful for stopping calls to particular contacts in a campaign.

mobile_numbers.description: (Required) Array of mobile numbers to terminate within the campaign (max 100)

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or no terminable calls found.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

metadata.og:title: Terminate All Calls to Numbers | Revenueable AI

patch.description: Terminates all active calls (across all campaigns) to specific mobile numbers.

mobile_numbers.description: (Required) Array of mobile numbers to terminate calls for across all campaigns (max 100)

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid mobile numbers or no terminable calls found.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

post.description: Creates a new non-deterministic knowledge base. Rate limit: 10 requests per hour per workspace. File size limit: 2 MB per file, 5 MB total. Maximum 10 files and 20 URLs per request.

files.description: (Optional) Array of files to upload (max 10 files, 2 MB each, 5 MB total)

urls.description: (Optional) JSON string array of URLs to index (max 20 URLs)

faqs.description: (Optional) JSON string array of FAQ objects
faqs.example: [{"question": "What is your return policy?", "answer": "30-day money back guarantee"}]

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or file size exceeded.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - Maximum 10 requests per hour.

patch.description: Edits an existing knowledge base by adding or removing files, URLs, and FAQs. Rate limit: 20 requests per hour per workspace. File size limit: 2 MB per file, 5 MB total.

kb_id.description: (Required) ID of the knowledge base to edit

files_to_remove.description: (Optional) JSON string array of file IDs to remove

urls_to_remove.description: (Optional) JSON string array of URLs to remove

faqs_to_remove.description: (Optional) JSON string array of FAQ IDs to remove

new_files.description: (Optional) Array of new files to upload

new_urls.description: (Optional) JSON string array of new URLs to add

new_faqs.description: (Optional) JSON string array of new FAQ objects
new_faqs.example: [{"question": "Do you ship internationally?", "answer": "Yes, worldwide shipping available"}]

new_files_metadata.description: (Optional) JSON string object with metadata for new files

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - Maximum 20 requests per hour.

get.description: Retrieves a specific knowledge base by its ID. Rate limit: 60 requests per hour per workspace.

status.description: Processing status of the knowledge base

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - Maximum 60 requests per hour.

delete.description: Deletes a knowledge base by its ID. Rate limit: 10 requests per minute per workspace.

parameters.name: kb_id
parameters.description: (Required) ID of the knowledge base to delete

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - Maximum 10 requests per minute.

metadata.title: Get All Knowledge Bases | Revenueable AI
metadata.og:title: Get All Knowledge Bases | Revenueable AI

get.description: Retrieves all knowledge bases for the current workspace. Rate limit: 60 requests per hour per workspace.

200.description: List of all knowledge bases retrieved successfully.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - Maximum 60 requests per hour.
